mapper.insert: insert into usertbl(userid, pwd, name, num, tel, email, addr, startdate, opt) values(#{userId}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{num}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{addr}, TO_DATE(#{startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{opt})
mapper.select: select count(userid) from usertbl where userid=#{userId}
select count(userid) from usertbl where userid=#{userId} and pwd=#{pwd}
select userid, pwd, name, num, tel, email, zip, addr, startdate, photo, opt, zzim, regdate, point from usertbl where userid=#{userId}
select userid, name, tel, email, point, addr from usertbl where userid=#{param1}
mapper.update: update usertbl set pwd=#{pwd}, tel=#{tel}, email=#{email}, addr=#{addr}, startdate=TO_DATE(#{startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where userid=#{userId}
